name: ScrabbleScores
0:
”Alexa, ask scrabble scores how much does ocean score”
”Alexa, tell scrabble scores to score the word hello”
”Alexa, ask scrabble scores what is the score of ship”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scrabble scores
des: You can calculate the Scrabble score of any word. Does not yet handle double or triple word yet, but that's in progress!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
